description:
Hi ,  this is in relation to  the below , Police Scotland have been informed and provided below case number

Incident Number: PS-20251103-0779
Crime Report Number: CR/0467681/25
Crime Type: FRAUD
The incident is where 2 of my  decentralised crypto wallets getting drained ( phantom approx $25k in assets - metamask approx $5-6k in assets. This is highly likely due to a 3rd party app that was mistakenly installed on my pc and ran at a later date , or the virus ( drainer) was dormant
I am currently working with George B Alayon Jr. ( also love on linkedin) (no :+1 512-839-1729) who resides in Texas and claims to be experienced in this area of retrieval .  ( AI has stated this guy is a scammer , no funds have been sent )

I have been informed by him that 

"The only viable solution involves deploying decryption scripts on the main wallet. By using an Antminer as an exploit kit, we can establish a custom retrieval route to make the funds spendable. This detailed process allows us to navigate the blockchain intricacies and transfer the funds"

Please see transaction ID of the thefts below 

Heres the url 
https://t.co/3XVN3AUZQZ

Heres the tx
43AuFF4jgb1QrnrWqcRxjDVLsx4k9GctDNhJFdM1UrzyvxhYSCWK2rPq2nAcNZeKx62vXBhU3JaG8C5eVyDJK8xu

https://etherscan.io/tx/0xee6758e230ea90c7727956d4a040d713df0e2a527661f79923b2c3c759f062f4

https://etherscan.io/tx/0x8eb0b309572be68a7a75c9ecbc8ee65e3f0a3a79e013d49ccf65b88ee9cd1ebb

https://etherscan.io/tx/0x03726a138003c15796d1c24c3dbeabbdc40f13ec2a9e3e2ad723d862f6d743c1

https://etherscan.io/tx/0xb27d227e7acd8904085831409f515df1317d7980b895aaeebb80467b891b80ae

https://etherscan.io/tx/0x891b5874a242536f5ab1f8007a025d912a494b6ea8f87842c51756fb47429293

https://etherscan.io/tx/0xffdca4612a92cd20b7c2b1d86579c481066bd9862ad951b3c2676876c1ebbc2c



Please can you analyse these transaction ids and locate where the funds are , please advise if these are retreivablr at all or if it is a lost cause. This was my future money for my childs future thanks
